channel.title: Hacking Whonix Gate and Workstation
channel.description:
On practice, can elite security experts with 0-day exploits or other unknown malwares exploit first workstation, then gateway and identify host machine, in other words, can expert hack whonix and bypass virtualbox to exploit host machine obtaining critical information, btc wallets and so on...
The clue is to compromise Whonix and get out of the Virtual Box infecting host machine
